title: The Experts_(1988)[XviD]
description:
Title: The Experts

Released: 1988
Length: 01:33:19
Size: 979MB
Genre: Comedy, Drama

Plot: A Russian spy cleverly abducts two Americans, by paying them to open
a New York style nightclub in rural Nebraska. However, they are taken to the 
Soviet Union to a mock-up Nebraska town in an attempt to train other spies how to act like Americans do. The K.G.B. is foiled when the town's inhabitants
defend the Americans Travis (John Travolta) and Wendell (Arye Gross) because now they are just like them.

Starring: John Travolta, Arye Gross, James Keach, Deborah Foreman, Kelly Preston, Jan Rubes and Charles Martin Smith
